# summary

```{r}
filter.low <- cd.id$confidence.circle=="Low" & cd.id$confidence.star=="Low"
summary(cd.id[filter.low,]$size.sn.neuron)
```

```{r}
summary(cd.id[!filter.low,]$size.sn.neuron)
```


# Low compared to not-low confidence RNAscope samples

```{r}



ggplot(cd.id, aes(x = size.sn.neuron, y = size.sn.glial)) + 
  geom_point() + facet_wrap(~remove.low)



```
